scripts.build: tsc -p tsconfig.json && tailwindcss -i src/styles/input.css -o dist/public/styles.css --minify && cp -r public/* dist/public/
scripts.preview: docker build --build-arg APP_VERSION=$(git describe --tags --always --dirty 2>/dev/null || echo dev) -t dokku-dashboard-preview . && docker rm -f $(docker ps -q --filter publish=4200) 2>/dev/null; docker run --name dokku-dashboard-preview --rm --env-file .env -p 4200:4200 dokku-dashboard-preview
